summary: This document is a certification from the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands regarding the amendment of the Articles of Incorporation for a corporation originally named Financial Informatics, Inc., which changed its name to Southern Titus Company, Inc. The amendment was recorded on October 31, 2012.

persons.name: Gray R. R. Francis
persons.context: Gray R. R. Francis is the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands who certifies the amendment of the corporation's name.

events.title: Certification of Corporate Name Change
events.description: The Lieutenant Governor certifies the amendment of the Articles of Incorporation for Financial Informatics, Inc. to change its name to Southern Titus Company, Inc.

keyFacts: The document certifies the name change of Financial Informatics, Inc. to Southern Titus Company, Inc.
The amendment was filed on September 21, 2012.
The certification was recorded on October 31, 2012.
Gray R. R. Francis is the Lieutenant Governor who signed the document.
